title: Minimum Sum of Absolute Differences of Pairs
description:
You are given two arrays A and B of equal length N. Your task is to pair each element of array A to an element in array B, such that the sum of the absolute differences of all the pairs is minimum.

Example 1:

Input:
N = 4
A = {4,1,8,7}
B = {2,3,6,5}
Output:
6
Explanation:
If we take the pairings as (1,2), (4,3),
(7,5), and (8,6), the sum will be S =
|1 - 2| + |4 - 3| + |7 - 5| + |8 - 6| = 6.
It can be shown that this is the minimum sum we can get.

Example 2:

Input:
N = 3
A = {4,1,2}
B = {2,4,1}
Output:
0

ioSpec.inputFormat:
First line contains N (length of arrays)
Second line contains N space-separated integers for array A
Third line contains N space-separated integers for array B
ioSpec.outputFormat: Print a single integer representing the minimum sum of absolute differences
